ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ رُشْدَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Ibrahim his right guidance early on, and We had complete knowledge of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had earlier given Abraham true direction, for We knew him well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We had bestowed wisdom upon Abraham even earlier, and We knew him well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Abraham We gave the right guidance and We knew him very well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We bestowed Ibrahim with guidance from the beginning, and We were Aware of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We bestowed aforetime on Ibrahim his guidance, and We were Well-Acquainted with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave to Ibrahim his rectitude before, and We knew him fully well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We gave Abraham aforetime his rectitude -- for We knew him --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave Abraham of old his proper course, and We were Aware of him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Before this We gave Abraham his guidance. We knew him well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vouchsafed un to lbrahim his rectitude aforetime, and him We had ever known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We had given Abraham his probity before, and We knew him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We bestowed aforetime on Abraham his rectitude of conduct, and well were We acquainted with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We bestowed aforetime on Ibrahim (Abraham) his (portion of) guidance, and We were Well-Acquainted with him (as to his Belief in the Oneness of Allah, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Before this We gave Abraham his virtue, for We knew him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave Abraham his integrity formerly, and We knew him well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:51] And verily We had given Abraham his rectitude before, that is, his [right] guidance before he came of age — and We were Aware of him, in that he was deserving of such [guidance],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We verily gave Abraham of old) before he reached the age of puberty; it is also said that this means: We honoured him with prophethood before Moses and Aaron; and it said that this means: before Muhammad (pbuh) (his proper course) i.e. knowledge and understanding, (and We were Aware of him) i.e. that he deserved it,
